signUpPage.emailTip: Enter the email you want to register with
signUpPage.passwordTip: Remember to not re use the same passwords
signUpPage.failedRegistration: Unable to register an account with these credentials

verifyAccount.title: A registration email has been sent to {{email}}. Please open this email to finish the sign up process.
verifyAccount.paragraph1: If you don't see this email in your inbox within 15 minutes, look for it in your junk mail folder.

verifiedAccount.title: That's it! Your account is now fully registered!
verifiedAccount.paragraph1: Thank you for registering an account at F1Info!

unExpectedError.title: Oops! Something went wrong!
unExpectedError.paragraph1: Your account registration state has not been altered! Please try registering again later!

timedOutToken.title: It took you too long!
timedOutToken.paragraph1: You need to verify your account within 30 minutes! Please register with the same email to try again!

alreadyVerified.title: No need!
alreadyVerified.paragraph1: It appears you have already verified this account!

loginPage.emailTip: Enter the email you registered your account with
loginPage.passwordTip: A password manager can store complicated passwords
loginPage.invalidCredentials: Your login credentials don't match an account in our system
loginPage.tooManyRequests: You have made too many failed login attempts. Please wait 10 minutes and try again
loginPage.disabledAccount: Please verify your email as to enable this account

resetPasswordPage.title: Reset Password
resetPasswordPage.hint: Enter a new password for your account
resetPasswordPage.messageTitle: You have successfully created a new password for your account!
resetPasswordPage.timedOutToken: You need to reset password within 30 minutes! Please make a new request!
resetPasswordPage.samePassword: New password has to be different from old password!
resetPasswordPage.unExpectedError: Unable to set new password, please try again later!

forgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot your password
forgotPasswordPage.hint: Enter the email for the account you want to reset your password
forgotPasswordPage.unableToReset: Unable to reset password for account with this email

message.paragraph1: Please open this email as to be create a new password for your account.
